item.description:
What?  A Cashflow meetup?  After all this time?

 

HOORAY!!!!!

 

That's right, friends, it's time to play some Cashflow once again.  So wipe the dust off of your calculators, sharpen your pencils -- not Pens! -- and join us on 6/26 at Northeastern's Marino Rec Center.

 

This is a great location because it's air conditioned and you can buy food and stuff right next to where we play.  

 

Beginners AND Advanced players welcome!

 

See you there!

 

Oh, since it's Sunday, you can park on Hemenway Street even though it says Resident Parking.  DISCLAIMER:  If you get a ticket, it's not our fault!  I have never gotten one from parking there on a Sunday, but technically it is resident parking.

 

Call me at 617-519-3163 if you have problems finding us.

 

Russ
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Purple Bag and the Cashflow Board Game
item.name: Meet and Play Cashflow!!
